showerReviews.reviewText: Probably the worst loves you will experience. Don‚Äôt stop here. Tons of people just hanging around. Men‚Äôs restroom completely closed. No sign even on the door. Weird vibes all around. Went out of my way to stop here because it‚Äôs a loves. It‚Äôs not the loves vibe at all.
Nashville TN Loves. Very disappointed in this location as far as the upkeep. Staff is awesome. The Men's bathroom is bad. Fixtures are broken and it's dirty. Trash piles at the fuel islands.
The place was not as clean as it should be, although I noticed that there were quite a few workers.

with so many workers I always see at least 4 or more workers and none of them can clean this area the coffee and breakfast section.very nasty who will want to eat at a place like this? where is the manager? I bet the manager house is as nasty as this place and that's why they don't care of cleaning

showerReviews.reviewText: Has great pizza, friendly people restrooms very clean, highly reccomend you go there

The restroom was fairly filthy and two of the stalls had no toilet paper at all. The handicap stall toilet was clogged and it looked like it had been there for a bit. I get that it was under construction, but there should have been more attention paid the restroom. I did not visit anywhere else in the store.

I really like this store. It has a dine- in or drive through options, Dairy Queen. The store is very clean, in order, very accessible, and family owned. They have everything from souvenirs, clothes, toys, pizza that is freaking amazing!! ‚Ä¶

To be fair, the Subway has been pretty good. The folks behind the service station counter are very nice. The biggest knock on the whole place is the cleanliness of the bathrooms. I‚Äôm not sure they have been cleaned since the place opened. ‚Ä¶
Gas, food, Dairy Queen, clean bathroom, super friendly staff!!

Honestly my favorite gas station in Joelton. But dude, the men's bathroom... if the owner is reading this, PLEASE clean the damn bathrooms, and often. Seems like half of the reviews on here are from people bad mouthing the bathroom, and they aren't wrong. Bathroom is gross. Fix it.
